snippet: Works by the Argentine composer Osvaldo Golijov, performed by the St. Lawrence String Quartet and other musicians at Carnegie Hall on Monday, abounded with allusions to folk tunes and prayer melodies.
abstract: Corinna da Fonseca-Wollheim reviews concert devoted to works of Argentine composer Osvaldo Golijov, performed by St Lawrence String Quartet and other musicians at Carnegie Hall.
lead_paragraph: Works by the Argentine composer Osvaldo Golijov, performed by the St. Lawrence String Quartet and other musicians at Carnegie Hall on Monday, abounded with allusions to folk tunes and prayer melodies.

headline.seo: Osvaldo Golijov Compositions at Zankel Hall
headline.main: Music Seems Familiar, Even When It’s Not
headline.print_headline: Music Seems Familiar, Even When It’s Not
